answers.answer: HELLO, DO YOU HAVE THIS COLD/WET FEELING ANYWHERE ELSE ON YOUR BODY? I HAPPEN TO HAVE NEUROPATHY CAUSED BY MY DIABETES. FOR THE MOST PART I ONLY HAVE NUMBNESS, AND THE TINGLING/PINS ?NEEDLES FEELING. WELL FOR SOME REASON I WILL OCCASIONALLY HAVE THE FEELING (ON MY LEG OR FOOT) THAT COLD WATER HAS BEEN SPILLED OR SPLASHED ON ME, BUT THERE NEVER IS ANYTHING ON ME. I ASKED MY DOTOR AND WAS TOLD THAT IT MOST LIKELY IS THE NEUROPATHY, THAT NERVE DAMAGE  CAN HAVE THAT EFFECT TOO. I HOPE YOU GET SOME MORE IDEAS TO HELP YOU FIGURE THIS OUT. BEST WISHES.

question: periodically and recently i feel a cold/wet spot on my inner thigh. The spot is actually dry. It comes and goes
title: cold/wet feeling
